thread.title: Joe Hart hints at Torino stay as Manchester City reject admits he’s loving life as a goalkeeper in Italian football

author: achapman
title: Joe Hart hints at Torino stay as Manchester City reject admits he’s loving life as a goalkeeper in Italian football
text:
EFL Closer to the Hart Joe Hart hints at Torino stay as Manchester City reject admits he’s loving life as a goalkeeper in Italian football 
England No 1 was sent packing by Pep Guardiola last summer but could stay put despite being wanted by English teams By Anthony Chapman 15th March 2017, 8:39 pm Updated: 15th March 2017, 8:45 pm
